accost.name: Accost
accost.desc: A round of combat happens twice if user has higher HP and Attack Speed than foe.

adept.name: Adept
adept.desc: (Attack Speed)% for the user to do two consecutive strikes.

astra.name: Astra
astra.desc: (Skill)% chance for the user to do 5 consecutive strikes in a row.

bargain.name: Bargain
bargain.desc: User can buy items for half-price in shops.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: Allies within a 3 tile radius receive +10 accuracy and avoid.

dance.name: Dance
dance.desc: Allows an ally to move again.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.desc: (Luck x 3)% chance to avoid an attack that would kill the user. The user will keep dodging all other attacks until the combat ends.

nihil.name: Nihil
nihil.desc: Negates foe's combat skills during combat.

reference.Item:
Nihil Manual
Shadow Sword
Mareeta's Sword

paragon.name: Paragon
paragon.desc: User gets double experience. Stacks with Paragon mode.

pavise.name: Pavise
pavise.desc: (Level)% chance to completely negate a attack.

renewal.name: Renewal
renewal.desc: Restores 5%~10% of the user's HP at the start of each turn.

sol.name: Sol
sol.desc: (Skill)% chance to restore HP as the same amount of damage dealt to foe.

steal.name: Steal
steal.desc: Can steal items if user has more speed than foe and more constitution than the item's weight.

vantage.name: Vantage
vantage.desc: User strikes first if foe initiates combat.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.desc:
Guaranteed critical hit if foe initiates combat.

**Interactions if unit has Vantage:**
If foe doesn't have Vantage
Wrath doesn't activate.
If foe also has Vantage
Wrath activates.

Wrath also activates if foe has Vantage but the user doesn't.
